name: Candy Crush... The Shooter!?? (Uniquely Similar Jam)
name_original: Candy Crush... The Shooter!?? (Uniquely Similar Jam)
description:
Made for The Uniquely Similar Game Jam.

Everything was made by me including the music, sound effects, art, and the programming.

programs used:

GameMaker Studio 2(Game Engine): https://www.yoyogames.com/gamemaker

Bfxr(Sound Effects): https://www.bfxr.net/

Ableton(Music): https://www.ableton.com/

I have a youtube channel were I upload gaming videos and launchpad covers, etc. The videos are in Spanish. Here is a link if you are interested: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7lQwaONTJzh1cuA2HAXm9Q

Thank you for playing!
